replies.body:
Bought five mystery skins and got Muse Sona, Silent Night Sona, Guqin Sona, Arcade Sona and Weather Forcast Janna. Is that a sign telling me that I should main support especially Sona? :| 

And give me DJ Sona if that's the case!
http://gyazo.com/5371588276c8f52d643dda7f20c07550 This is what I got xD

This is what I got:

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CXSPlfn7pY0/TpoJWZcn3rI/AAAAAAAAAFw/tybTx1r28bw/s1600/I-got-a-rock.png
WHATS IT NAME
Sona Palmer.

I feel you.  I got Arcade Sona, Blackthorn Morgana, Bloodstone Taric, and El Tigre Braum.

I also got Battlecast Skarner, so I hope his rework turns out alright.

I know I actually don't mind since I do play Sona but I wished I have gotten some skins
for my other champions. 

Either way I guess it's not a bad deal considering they worth more than what I spent on them.
If that will make you feel a little better. :)

Oh, I'm not disappointed.  I enjoy playing Morgana and Taric (and those are my favourite skins for them) and I like Arcade Sona even if I don't play her.  Battlecast Alpha Skarner was a lucky gift; I might not play him atm, but that may change after the rework and it's a great skin.

The only one I'm kind of disappointed about is El Tigre Braum since I already own Dragon Slayer Braum, but it's still a nice skin for a champion I enjoy.
fifth age {{champion:44}} best

I got hextech Janna and Bloodstone Taric. From 2 of the mystery skins. I'm so pissed. Been saving that RP for 2 weeks cause i knew there would be mystery skins. Why riot why? Those champs I barely have played and I don't even like the support role! TARIC REMEBER THAT TARIC!
I literally just spent all my rp. Why rito whyyy?
Same here,since my birthday was a couple of days ago i got $50 of rp and spent it all yesterday without knowing this even was coming up, i'm pretty bummed out {{item:3070}}
Looks like my wallet's gonna be feedin' the fishes. {{item:3070}}
Anyone else not get their free mystery skin?

i have not gotten my free mystery skins and i've bought like 18 i think including ones for other people.....they said within a week of the bonus times end we would get them but as time goes on im worried i just wont get my free bonus skins.....

YO RIOT!

Where muh free bonus skins at!
thats annoying man, me and my bro bought loads of RP a few days ago and went mad with mysterys and now this comes out? pathetic
Instead of randomly buying mystery skins, wait until Riot announces promotions like these to buy them.
yes because I have the power to see the future dont I? Usually at the end of events they say thanks for participating not more cash grabbing

exactly, I just spent my RP a few days ago too. -_- they should announce this shit @ the beginning of the event. not during the event, especially when so many ppl already bought RP for the new skins that came out... would have saved some more if I knew this was gonna happen beforehand.
They should make it retroactive. Any Mystery Skins bought in the last month or so will apply.
Nope Still waiting on riot {{item:3070}}

Guys. They're giving players a bonus if you purchase 6-12-18-etc mystery gifts. They never offered a bonus before this, it's just an extra that you can get. It's anything *but* a cash grab. Riot is being more generous then ever before with this event. This is a very kind bonus if you do give that much to friends or yourself, and if you don't gift 6+ then whatever, you still get what you purchased anyways. This is a good way to give back to those who gift a lot or are planning on gifting soon. Thank you! :D
18 mysteries, no rewards yet

lol I bought 30 mystery items, and I'm still waiting on my 5 freebies. I know the FAQ said it could take up to a week, but I'm just impatient lol! I've login to my account like 10 times a day since the event ended to see if I got my freebies yet! I'm so excited, its like waiting for christmas morning only you have no idea when that will actually come (just within a week) lol!
what a cash grab
Anyone else only get one bonus skin after buying 12 or more mystery chests?

Its almost been a week and I've still not received my bonus skins. Why is this taking so long?! This is just getting ridiculous! Nearly everyone has not received their bonus skins yet and a week has almost passed! I feel like I'm getting ripped off!

I bought 13 Mystery Skins, and I haven't received any mystery skins yet, and it's nearly been a week.

GIVE ME 'EM ALREADY!
What is inside a Mystery Chest?
Your soul that you hand over to Rito.
Ahh, that makes sense, GG.{{item:3113}}
I got a Warring Kingdoms {{champion:59}} ...I don't even PLAY JUNGLE!
then why do you have him?

I'm impressed that "What happens if I own **_every skin_** at the end of the event..." comes up often enough that it's considered a Frequently Asked Question. lol

I mean I have quite a collection going, but damn.
Do they really need a daily purchase limit? Are they trying not to take my money. >.<
If it ended on 8/10 @2AM PDT then there's about 4 hours left until a week passes.
if we didnt get it in today,that means~~~~you know~~

News articles. 

I'm still new to League but I don't think Riot would run scams. I'm guessing either something went wrong with the auto-distribution, it's set to distribute exactly a week from the event, or they forgot.
It's now the 17th, and I've bought 13 mysteries. Still no bonus skins. Riot pls.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Who wants to get gifted! 

http://i.imgur.com/zNuI19W.png

:) Leave IGNS
Ive opened 13, gotten 4 Teemo skins, is this a sign telling me that Im satan?
if I buy 3 Mystery Chest and 3 Mystery Skin, could I get the free Mystery Skin?
No point at all for buying skin in this game , you can get reported for no reason at all and get a 2 weeks ban. Keep your skin son , ill keep my money ty.

I don't know about you, but in the 2,000+ games of League that I've played, I have yet to get reported often enough to get banned. Their system works by analyzing frequent reports, not an individual one. If you have been banned by the system, you might want to look into why. Maybe you rage at your team-mates too often, or maybe you dc every other game. In any case, almost all bans have a decent reason behind them, and I doubt yours was or is a special exception.
Well, cya money.
Same I've got 2 outa 3 too! I got sultan gp and a panth skin!
thanks!  Can you confirm if they will show up in our gifting history as from Riot or something?
I just checked, and it looks like they don't actually show in the gifting history at all. :(
